get.summary: Get running version of the service

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number to retrieve. If you provide invalid value the default page number will applied

**Example:** 1


**Default Value:** 1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of records per page.


**Example:** 20



**Default Value:** 20



**Max Value:** 100


If provided value is greater than max value, max value will be applied.

parameters.name: filter.name
parameters.description:
Filter by name query param.

**Format:** filter.name={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE



**Example:** filter.name=$btw:John Doe&filter.name=$contains:John Doe

**Available Operations**
- $eq

- $gt

- $gte

- $in

- $null

- $lt

- $lte

- $btw

- $ilike

- $sw

- $contains

- $not

- $and

- $or

- $eq

- $gt

- $gte

- $in

- $null

- $lt

- $lte

- $btw

- $ilike

- $sw

- $contains

- $not

- $and

- $or

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Parameter to sort by.
To sort by multiple fields, just provide query param multiple types. The order in url defines an order of sorting

**Format:** {fieldName}:{DIRECTION}


**Example:** sortBy=name:DESC&sortBy=createdAt:DESC


**Default Value:** createdAt:ASC

**Available Fields**
- name

- createdAt

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search term to filter result values

**Example:** John


**Default Value:** No default value

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description:
List of fields to search by term to filter result values

**Example:** name


**Default Value:** By default all fields mentioned below will be used to search by term

**Available Fields**
- name

**Example:** sortBy=code:DESC&sortBy=name:DESC


**Default Value:** name:DESC

**Available Fields**
- code

- name

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search term to filter result values

**Example:** John


**Default Value:** No default value

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description:
List of fields to search by term to filter result values

**Example:** name


**Default Value:** By default all fields mentioned below will be used to search by term

**Available Fields**
- name

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number to retrieve. If you provide invalid value the default page number will applied

**Example:** 1


**Default Value:** 1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of records per page.


**Example:** 20



**Default Value:** 20



**Max Value:** 100


If provided value is greater than max value, max value will be applied.

parameters.name: filter.status
parameters.description:
Filter by status query param.

**Format:** filter.status={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE



**Example:** filter.status=$btw:John Doe&filter.status=$contains:John Doe

**Available Operations**
- $eq

- $gt

- $gte

- $in

- $null

- $lt

- $lte

- $btw

- $ilike

- $sw

- $contains

- $not

- $and

- $or
